definitions.definition: If an action or event is impossible, it cannot happen or be achieved:
examples: It was impossible to sleep because of the noise.

definitions.definition: An impossible situation is extremely difficult to deal with or solve:
examples: It's an impossible situation - she's got to leave him but she can't bear losing her children.

definitions.definition: An impossible person behaves very badly or is extremely difficult to deal with:
examples: I had to leave the job because my boss was impossible.
